title: James Galway Program 6
brief_description: James Galway introduces the Kings Singers to sing “O Lusty May” (Scots 16C) “Woe worth the time” (Scots 16C), “There’s Nae Luck” (trad), “O Waly” (trad - cello accompaniment Timothy Hughs), “Sea Runes” by M Davies, “The Bee by Bridge”, “The Flight of the Bumble Bee” by Rimsky Korsakov, “Creole Love Call” by Duke Ellington. Rated G
